text: Rachel McAdams'welcomes first child with boyfriend Jamie Linden'This is the first child for the Mean Girls star Congratulations are in order for Rachel McAdams! The Notebook actress, 39, and her boyfriend Jamie Linden have welcomed a new baby boy, according to a new report. The happy couple were recently spotted out and about with their new bundle of joy, claims Hollywood Pipeline. News of the pregnancy was revealed back in February. Rachel and her 37 - year - old screenwriter beau were first linked in April 2016, but have maintained a low - profile throughout their romance. They rarely appear in public together, and are still yet to make their red carpet debut as a couple. Rachel McAdams has welcomed a son, according to a new report Mean Girls star Rachel was notice
